OrderPaymentSummaryReference.name: OrderPaymentSummaryReference
OrderPaymentSummaryReference.description: OrderPaymentSummaryReference is a junction object that allows an order payment summary to be shared with another order summary.

AuthorizationAmount.description: Amount of the OrderPaymentSummary that has been authorized.

CapturedAmount.description: Amount of the OrderPaymentSummary that has been captured.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for the currency of the OrderSummary associated with the OrderPaymentSummary. Order Management APIs and actions that create an OrderPaymentSummary for an OrderSummary set this value. The default value is USD.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed this record. A null value can mean that this record was only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OrderPaymentSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderPaymentSummary shared with the OrderSummary (exchange order).

OrderSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderSummary (exchange order) that the OrderPaymentSummary is shared with.

RefundedAmount.description: Amount of the OrderPaymentSummary that was refunded.

ReservedBalanceAmount.description: Reserved balance amount for the exchange order for the order payment summary relationship.

ReservedBalanceTotalAmount.description: Summary of all the ReservedBalanceAmount for all the order payment summary references.

Type.description: Type of reference between the OrderSummary and the OrderPaymentSummary.
